title: Conversion from BFT to MS
description:
BFT_TO_MS calculete wind speeds on the Beaufort scale in meters per seï¿¾cond.
The calculation is done using the formula:
BFT_TO_MS = 0.836m/s * B^3/2
name: BFT_TO_MS

input.name: BFT
input.description: An integer value representing BFT to be converted to MS.

return_value.description: The converted MS value calculated as BFT raised to the power of 1.5 multiplied by 0.836.
